if(NOT DEFINED EOC_HOME)
	include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../EocBuildHelper.cmake)
else()
	include(${EOC_HOME}/EocBuildHelper.cmake)
endif()
	
find_package(Catch2 REQUIRED)
aux_source_directory(. EocSystem_DIR_TESTS)
add_executable(EocSystem_Test ${EocSystem_DIR_TESTS})
set_property(TARGET EocSystem_Test PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
set_property(TARGET EocSystem_Test PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
target_link_libraries(EocSystem_Test EocSystem Catch2::Catch2)
include(CTest)
include(Catch)
catch_discover_tests(EocSystem_Test)
